solution_line_template: The best player averages {best_player_avg_hits_per_game} hits a game because {best_player_total_hits} / {initial_games_played} = <<{best_player_total_hits}/{initial_games_played}={best_player_avg_hits_per_game}>>{best_player_avg_hits_per_game}

The rest of the team averages {rest_of_team_avg_hits_per_game} hits a game because {team_avg_hits_per_game} - {best_player_avg_hits_per_game} = <<{team_avg_hits_per_game}-{best_player_avg_hits_per_game}={rest_of_team_avg_hits_per_game}>>{rest_of_team_avg_hits_per_game}

The rest of the players average {avg_hits_per_other_player_per_game} hit a game because {rest_of_team_avg_hits_per_game} / {num_other_players} = <<{rest_of_team_avg_hits_per_game}/{num_other_players}={avg_hits_per_other_player_per_game}>>{avg_hits_per_other_player_per_game}

They will average {avg_hits_per_other_player_next_games} hits per player over the next {next_games_count} games because {next_games_count} x {avg_hits_per_other_player_per_game} = <<{next_games_count}*{avg_hits_per_other_player_per_game}={avg_hits_per_other_player_next_games}>>{avg_hits_per_other_player_next_games}
